recaps.1: Snow struggles with his family's declining status while preparing for the Academy's prize announcement and mentor assignments.
recaps.2: The tributes arrive in the Capitol, and Snow meets his assigned tribute Lucy Gray Baird from District 12.
recaps.3: Snow and the other mentors are introduced to their tributes as the 10th Hunger Games preparations begin.
recaps.4: Dr. Gaul challenges the mentors to make the Games more engaging, while Snow works to help Lucy Gray.
recaps.5: The mentors visit the arena with their tributes, and Snow begins to understand the true nature of the Games.
recaps.6: The tributes are interviewed on television, with Lucy Gray's performance captivating the Capitol audience.
recaps.7: The Games begin with a bloodbath at the Cornucopia, and several tributes are eliminated early.
recaps.8: The surviving tributes adapt to the arena while the mentors try to help them through sponsorship.
recaps.9: Alliances form and break as the tributes struggle to survive in the deteriorating arena.
recaps.10: The number of tributes continues to dwindle as the Games progress with increasing violence.
recaps.11: Lucy Gray emerges victorious from the 10th Hunger Games, but Snow's role in her victory comes under scrutiny.
recaps.12: Snow faces consequences for his actions during the Games and learns about his future assignment.
recaps.13: Snow prepares to leave the Capitol for his mandatory service as a Peacekeeper.
recaps.14: Snow begins his journey to District 12 as punishment for his interference in the Games.
recaps.15: Snow arrives in District 12 and begins his service as a Peacekeeper under Commander Hoff.
recaps.16: Snow settles into life in District 12 and reunites with Sejanus, who has also been assigned there.
recaps.17: Snow discovers Lucy Gray survived and is living freely with the Covey in District 12.
recaps.18: Snow and Lucy Gray rekindle their relationship while Snow learns about life in the districts.
recaps.19: Snow witnesses the harsh realities of district life and begins to question his beliefs.
recaps.20: Tensions rise in District 12 as Snow becomes more involved with Lucy Gray and the Covey.
recaps.21: Snow's relationship with Lucy Gray deepens while he struggles with his loyalties.
recaps.22: Sejanus becomes involved with rebel activities, putting both himself and Snow at risk.
recaps.23: Snow faces difficult choices as Sejanus's rebel connections threaten their safety.
recaps.24: The consequences of Sejanus's actions force Snow to make a crucial decision about his future.
recaps.25: Snow deals with the aftermath of betraying Sejanus while planning his escape from District 12.
recaps.26: Snow and Lucy Gray plan to leave District 12 together, but their relationship begins to fracture.
recaps.27: Snow's paranoia and ambition clash with Lucy Gray's desire for freedom and honesty.
recaps.28: The final confrontation between Snow and Lucy Gray reveals the true nature of both characters.
recaps.29: Snow returns to the Capitol, having fully embraced his path toward becoming the future President.
recaps.30: Snow's transformation into the villain is complete as he begins his rise to power in Panem.
